title: 20 Minutes
subtitle: Heart rate and blood pressure drop to healthier levels.

title: 12 Hours
subtitle: Carbon monoxide levels in the blood return to normal.

title: 2 Weeks
subtitle: Circulation improves and lung function begins to enhance.

title: 1 Month
subtitle: Coughing and shortness of breath decrease; lung function improves further.

title: 3 Months
subtitle: Lung function continues to improve, making breathing easier and reducing symptoms like coughing.

title: 4 Months
subtitle: Improved overall energy levels and reduced risk of respiratory infections.

title: 5 Months
subtitle: Enhanced sense of taste and smell as the body recovers from the effects of smoking.

title: 6 Months
subtitle: Cilia in the lungs regain normal function, helping to clear mucus and reduce infections.

title: 8 Months
subtitle: Significant improvement in lung health, leading to fewer respiratory issues and less wheezing.

title: 1 Year
subtitle: Risk of coronary heart disease is reduced by 50% compared to a smoker’s risk, and overall health benefits are evident.

title: Rp 50,000
subtitle: Can buy a basic lunch at a local café.

title: Rp 100,000
subtitle: Enough for a stylish wallet.

title: Rp 200,000
subtitle: Can purchase a high-quality pair of wireless earbuds.

title: Rp 500,000
subtitle: Equivalent to a well-made office chair cushion.

title: Rp 1,000,000
subtitle: Can buy a decent quality air purifier.

title: Rp 2,000,000
subtitle: Enough for a mid-range tablet.

title: Rp 3,000,000
subtitle: Can cover the cost of a quality smartwatch.

title: Rp 5,000,000
subtitle: Equivalent to a 42-inch smart TV.

title: Rp 7,500,000
subtitle: Can purchase a top-tier smartphone.

title: Rp 10,000,000
subtitle: Enough for a high-quality gaming laptop with advanced features.

title: 10 Seconds
subtitle: The fastest 100-meter sprint by Usain Bolt, who completed it in 9.58 seconds.

title: 5 Minutes
subtitle: The longest time a person has held their breath underwater on pure oxygen, achieved by Stig Severinsen in 5 minutes and 32 seconds.

title: 26 Minutes
subtitle: The time it took for the fastest human to complete a 10-kilometer run, achieved by Joshua Cheptegei in 26 minutes and 38 seconds.

title: 1 Hour
subtitle: The longest time for a person to continuously balance a bicycle on one wheel, which is 1 hour and 1 minute, achieved by Fred Rompelberg.

title: 8 Hours
subtitle: The longest continuous period of sleep ever recorded, with the average duration being 8 hours.

title: 24 Hours
subtitle: The duration of a day, marked by Earth's rotation.

title: 7 Days
subtitle: The length of time in one week, containing 168 hours.

title: 1 Month
subtitle: The length of time in one lunar month, approximately 29.5 days.

title: 1 Year
subtitle: The length of time for Earth's orbit around the sun, approximately 365.25 days.

title: 10 Years
subtitle: A decade, the period in which significant technological advancements often occur.
